column4: that key vombo hasent worked by defaukt In ubuntu in ages. :)
I'm using 10.04 and it works for me. :-)
And dragging a folder to Terminal does not make Terminal cd to that folder.
It removes configuration files on my machine. From the apt-get manpage, "purge     purge is identical to remove except that packages are removed and purged (any configuration files are deleted too)."
